attr.title: Maou's Crucible
attr.desc: Maou's Crucible is a community-driven horde survivor roguelite featuring original characters from various creators. Enter the Crucible, survive against hordes of enemies, and claim the title of Demon Lord!
attr.inst: Download the game from Steam and put all game files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/4087610/Maous_Crucible) and put all game files into the `assets` folder.
